references.paper_title: Flamingo: a Visual Language Model for Few-Shot Learning
references.reason: This paper introduces Flamingo, a visual language model, which is fundamental to the development of multimodal GUI agents and is frequently cited.
This paper introduces Qwen, which is a frontier large vision-language model used by the paper as its base model, which makes it an important reference.

references.paper_title: GPT-3: Its nature, scope, limits, and consequences
references.reason: This paper discusses the influential GPT-3 model, which laid the groundwork for many subsequent large language models, influencing the architecture of many GUI agents.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: This paper presents CLIP, a model for learning visual models from natural language supervision, enabling strong grounding abilities that are crucial for GUI agents.

references.paper_title: LLaMA: Open and Efficient Foundation Language Models
references.reason: This paper introduces LLaMA, an open-source foundation language model, which is pivotal for open-source research and the development of GUI agents.
